title: Is urgot a good top laner or adc (Urgot is love Urgot is life)

replies.body:
Preferably, I go Urgot top, as his ridiculously short AA range makes him weak against practically every adc...

There is a Diamond 2 player in NA named Chimalpopica, who is an Urgot main. He made a very in-depth guide about Urgot top, but he does mention other roles, such as adc, jungle and support. Here's the guide:

http://www.lolking.net/guides/191090

Hope that helped

The only problem with Urgot ADC is his short range, making need to go close to the opposing team in teamfights, and can be harassed in lane, which can't be returned due to his shockingly bad mana. If he got a bit of a mana buff and add on another, say, 25 range, he would be a much stronger ADC, with targetable secondary autos. He still is strong at the moment, but is looked down upon by the community and is often a bit too dangerous to play, despite him being a tankier ADC.

I don't know anything about Urgot as a top-laner.
The problem is that people play him as an ADC. My friend plays him as an off-tank at top.

He's not a great champ to play. I play him sometimes just for laughs, but he just doesn't fit in anywhere.
He's an ADC whose abilities make him want to get in close to the other team. See the problem?
Just wondering, is Urgot a good champion to play?
